pacman
Class Rupee

java.lang.Object
  pacman.GameObject
      pacman.Rupee

public class Rupee
extends GameObject

Represents a rupee that is in the room for the player to collect.

Since:
2013-01-27
Author:
Alex Pennells

          The horizontal position to draw the sprite for the rupee.

 boolean increaseY
          True if the rupee has been collected and is animating up; otherwise, false.

Constructor Detail

Rupee

public Rupee(GameObjects objects,
             int xPos,
             int yPos)
Creates a rupee at the specified position.

Parameters:
objects - A reference to all the other objects in the game.
xPos - The X position to create the rupee.
yPos - The Y position to create the rupee.
Method Detail

move

public boolean move()
Handles the animation of the rupee raising into the air when it has already been collected by the player.

Returns:
True if the rupee has reached the top and can be destroyed; otherwise, false.
